en.about_text_1: Hajimi with over 100 billion views and countless fan-made music videos across the web.
en.about_text_2: Immerse yourself in Hajimi, a meme world full of jokes and music.
en.about_text_3: From a lyric to a cat, then to all cats and everything—this evolution is the Hajimi culture.
en.timeline_1_desc_1: Hajimi enters the Web3 stage as a Chinese MEME.
en.timeline_1_desc_4: Hajimi market cap breaks 95M on Oct 11.
en.timeline_2_desc_2: Community launches Contributor Program and Cultural Matrix Plan.
en.timeline_3_desc_3: Community merch distribution, Hajimi Cultural Creator Contest held.
en.timeline_3_desc_4: Hajimi Foundation established, first charity phase launched.
en.card_1_desc: From a lyric to a cat, then to all cats and everything—Hajimi culture.
en.card_2_desc: Every spread of Hajimi culture and charity action is the best return to the world.
en.card_3_desc: Hajimi Culture Website, featuring videos, music, memes, and more.
en.buy_title: Welcome to join the Hajimi World
en.mod6_title: From a lyric to a cat, then to all cats and everything—The Evolution of Hajimi Culture
en.mod6_list_1: Origin: From anime humming to cultural deconstruction
en.mod6_list_2: Breakthrough: The stage of Hajimi cultural deconstruction in China
en.mod6_list_3: Mainstream Breakout (2023-Present): Dominating short video platforms
en.mod6_list_4: Semantic Expansion: From 'cute' to 'lifestyle', linking to Web2 market
en.mod6_list_5: Cultural Recognition: 'Hajimi' listed as one of the top 10 buzzwords in the Gen Z Social Media White Paper.
en.mod6_conclusion: This is the history of Hajimi gaining hundreds of millions of fans and countless creations.
en.mod7_disclaimer: Disclaimer: Hajimi is a decentralized meme token. It has no team, no roadmap, no utility, and no expectation of financial return. This is not financial advice, please do your own research.
en.mod7_quote: — The purpose of creating this website is just to hear you say 'Hajimi'.

zh.about_text_1: 全网超千亿播放量和无数二创音乐视频的哈基米
zh.about_text_2: 沉浸于哈基米，一个充满梗和音乐的meme世界
zh.about_text_3: 一句歌词到一只猫咪再到所有猫咪和所有事物的演变就是哈基米文化
zh.create_btn: 创作属于你自己的哈基米音乐
zh.timeline_1_desc_1: 哈基米作为中文MEME登录Web3舞台
zh.timeline_2_desc_2: 哈基米获得币安生态加持成功上线币安Alpha，上线仅四天持币人数突破13000人。
zh.timeline_3_desc_1: 哈基米官方推特关注突破5000人
zh.timeline_3_desc_2: 哈基米频道关注突破7000人
zh.timeline_3_desc_3: 哈基米社区周边活动派送，举办哈基米文化创作者大赛
zh.timeline_3_desc_4: 哈基米基金会成立，同时期开启第一期慈善计划
zh.card_1_desc: 一句歌词到一只猫咪再到所有猫咪和所有事物的演变-哈基米文化。
zh.card_2_desc: 每一次的哈基米文化传播和慈善行动都是对世界最好的回报。
zh.card_3_desc: 哈基米文化网站，包含“视频，音乐，梗图等文化内容。
zh.mod6_title: 一句歌词到一只猫咪再到所有猫咪和所有事物的演变-哈基米文化
zh.mod6_list_1: 起源：从动漫哼唱到文化解构
zh.mod6_list_2: 突破时刻：中国进行哈基米文化解构的阶段
zh.mod6_list_3: 主流突破期（2023年至今）：称霸短视频平台
zh.mod6_list_4: 语义扩展：从“可爱”到“生活方式” 链接Web2市场
zh.mod6_list_5: 文化认可：“哈基米”被列入Z世代社交媒体白皮书十大热门词汇之一。
zh.mod6_conclusion: 这就是哈基米收获亿万粉丝和无数创作的历史
zh.mod7_disclaimer: 免责声明： 哈基米是一个去中心化的迷因代币。没有团队，没有路线图，没有实用价值，没有任何收益预期，这不是财务建议，请自行研究。
zh.mod7_quote: — 创建此网站的目的只想听你说一声「哈基米」。
